## Project: Next.js App with Centered Logo and Footer Links

This project creates a modern Next.js application with TypeScript, featuring a centered logo and footer with navigation links.

### Development Server
The development server is running. You can view the application at http://localhost:3000

### Project Features
- Centered animated logo with gradient design
- Footer with navigation links
- Responsive design with Tailwind CSS
- TypeScript support
- Dark mode compatibility

### Getting Started
1. Dependencies are already installed
2. Development server is running on http://localhost:3000
3. Edit components in `app/components/` to customize
4. Modify styles in `app/globals.css` or component files

### Project Structure
- `app/page.tsx` - Main homepage
- `app/components/Logo.tsx` - Animated logo component
- `app/components/Footer.tsx` - Footer with links
- `app/layout.tsx` - Root layout
- `app/globals.css` - Global styles
